Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc03
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.view.tui

Class Tui

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.view.ui.UI
it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.view.tui.Tui
public class Tui extends UI
The TUI user interface class.
